Text.Page:
The tertas seeds have sprouted. Plant them, and they'll grow quickly. Please deliver these seeds to {@LinkCreature:229#1019#Karsonak}. He's south of this camp researching arachnen mutations. Tertas will definitely help his study. I've got more seeds to sprout, but at least these are ready.

Take them to Karsonak and remind him to be careful!

By Oriyn's torch, these sprouts will be most useful! I shall plant them at once.

Because this region is so out of balance, I am reluctant to slaughter my research subjects. I much prefer to dose them and let them wake up a few hours later.

Whatever the root cause, there are lessons for us to learn. Let us continue with open minds.
